attributes.action: Sanitizer gel disposable for costumers in all the grocery stores.
attributes.background:
All the grocery stores must arrange an (x) number of sanitizer gel distributors,
depending on the number of customers that the same store can have, to avoid the spreads and contagions.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for supermarkets. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300758

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
